name: Foody
description: Foody.vn includes a website and mobile application which specialize in food reviews in South East Asia. Funded by CyberAgent Venture (Japan), Garena (Singapore) and Tiger Global Investment, Foody is accessed by more than 11 million visitors per month and become one of the top search engine in Vietnam with nearly 10 million followers, and become the leading website & mobile application in Vietnam for foodies to search and review eating places. Then, with the demand of our valued customers, Now.vn was launched to build a trusted platform for F&B ordering and delivery on demand and soon has become the leader in the market. Currently, Now.vn has a lot of merchants and partners nationwide and will continue to grow strongly in the future.
